----------


**Software (6)**

-   [iDEP](http://bioinformatics.sdstate.edu/idep/): Integrated Differential Expression and Pathway analysis
-   [ShinyGO](http://bioinformatics.sdstate.edu/go/): Gene Ontology Enrichment Analysis
-   [GSKB](http://ge-lab.org/#/data): Gene set knowledge base for Pathway Analysis in Mouse
-   GSKB: Bioconductor Package
-   [AraPath](http://ge-lab.org/#/data): Arabidopsis pathway data (now part of GSKB)
-   PPInfer: a Bioconductor package for inferring related proteins using protein interaction network

----------

**Data (3)**

-   [Download gene sets for pathway analysis in model species](http://ge-lab.org/#/data)
-   [Gene expression for antisense transcripts in human, mouse, and rat](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE41462)
-   [Expression data for normal human tissues](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE2361)
